description: PIMS #3453 CCEA-  Jamaica: Second National Communication to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Jamaica’s Second National Communication will be prepared based on the UNFCCC Guidelines for the preparation of national communications from Parties not included in Annex I of the Convention adopted at the 10th Conference of the Parties and are contained in Decision 17/CP.8.
subproject.title: Jamaica SNC to the UNFCCC

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Jamaica’s Second National Communication will be prepared based on the UNFCCC Guidelines for the preparation of national communications from Parties not included in Annex I of the Convention adopted at the 10th Conference of the Parties and are contained in Decision 17/CP.8.

title: Preparation of the SNC to the UNFCCC for Jamaica
